Content: Markets for empires could simply be supply and demand driven. Having a
running average should soften spikes. The proce could also be influence
by a rarity factor given as the fraction between all gos on the market
and units of this specific good on the market. This would encourage the
formation of an equilibirum by arbitrage and automatically value the
goods. (This system is inferior to the stock exchange since it does not
reason about the ''real'' costs of the good only its availability.)
